titleproper.value: Guide to the Time Inc. Annual Reports <lb/>1922-2013, undated <lb/> <num>MS 3009-RG 31</num>

author.value: Collection processed by Finding aid prepared by Holly Deakyne and Samantha Brown

creation.value: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace <date>2019-11-27T14:55:40</date>

abstract.value: Time Inc. Annual Reports includes annual reports for Time Inc. and later Time Warner Inc. after the merger in 1989; and annual reports from America Online, Inc. (AOL) sent to the library for use as reference at the time of that merger.

p.value: Open to qualified researchers. Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use.
This record group should be cited as Time Inc. Annual Reports, MS 3009-RG 31, New-York Historical Society.

Time Inc. Annual Reports includes annual reports for Time Inc. and later Time Warner Inc. after the merger in 1989. America Online, Inc. (AOL) includes reports sent to the library for use as reference at the time of that merger. Annual reports may include accompanying financial reports, fact books, or <title render="italic">Year in Review</title> books. Gaps in Time Inc. annual reports Annual Reports missing from Time Inc. are 2008 to 2009, 2011 to 2012, and 2014.

subject.value: Publishers and publishing -- New York (State)  -- New York.
